div.pre: 551 Mikrochorion, Drama district, Mace- donia, 1938 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 37 AE Cassander: 1 Amphipolis: 13 Pella: 20 Thessalonica: 1 Unc. Macedon: 2 Disposition: Athens 4 (1 ea. of Cassander, Amphipolis, Pella, Thessalonica) A hd. from Macedonia 1938 with 13 Amphi- polis, 20 Pella and 2 unc. Macedon (reported by W. Schwabacher) would seem to belong with the 4 Athens acquisitions from Mikrochorion
